title.rendered: Hillside Home Featured in Sunset Magazine

content.rendered:
The LEED-certified Hillside Home in Mill Valley, CA featuring the Montecito Cliffstone profile is beautifully presented in a four-page spread in the November issue of Sunset Magazine. Eldorado Stone recently produced an interactive video that captures the nature-inspired, high-design and breathtaking views of the home.

Watch the video here: https://www.eldoradostone.com/hillside 

About Sunset Magazine:
-Sunset Magazine is a regional lifestyle magazine for the American West with issues devoted to four subject areas: travel and recreation; garden and outdoor living; food and entertaining; home design, remodeling, and projects.
